infos.value: Vision cards placed on the Altar can gain experience based on the power of the offerings you give to them.
Put the Altar to good use and enhance your vision cards so that they can help lead you to victory in the battles ahead.

• Vision Card Altar•
Vision cards that are placed on the Altar will gain EXP periodically.

• Using the Altar •
Offerings are necessary to use the Altar. You can purchase offerings via the Replenish Offerings menu.

• Replenishing Offerings•
In the Replenish Offerings menu, you can replenish, purchase, and expand your offerings.

• Effects of Offerings •
There are offerings of different rarities. More EXP can be acquired by using higher rarity offerings.
